name: Assignment Special Access
description: The Assignment Special Access Brightspace Data Set returns all applicable special access start, end, and due dates for each assignment in the organization.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Assignment special access availability start date (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Assignment special access availability end date (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: DueDate
columns.description: Assignment special access due date (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User who modified the assignment special access.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the special access was last modified for the assignment (UTC)

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if special access has been deleted.

columns.name: StartDateAvailabilityType
columns.description: Determines whether learners can view or access the assignment before the StartDate. See About Availability Type for details. No data available for assignments created before December 2022/20.22.12. Field can be null.

columns.name: EndDateAvailabilityType
columns.description: Determines whether learners can view or access the assignment after the EndDate. See About Availability Type for details. No data available for assignments created before December 2022/20.22.12. Field can be null.
